item.title: Trump Shares Photo of Captured Nicolás Maduro, Blindfolded and Handcuffed
item.description: The Venezuelan president and his wife were flown out of Caracas by helicopter to the U.S.S. Iwo Jima, a warship taking them to New York.

item.title: To Trump, on Venezuela: You Break It, You Own It
item.description: His administration just decapitated the country’s leadership; he’s now responsible for what comes next there.
